articles.title: Interpol warns that COVID-19 vaccines could be targeted by criminals - Reuters
articles.description: The Interpol global police co-ordination agency warned on Wednesday that organised criminal networks could be targeting COVID-19 vaccines, and could look to sell fake shots.
articles.content:
